features.featureTitle: Add 5 new playable browser games to the Games tab, each built on a canvas with the existing neon/cyberpunk aesthetic and matching the GlassCard grid layout in GamesTab.tsx. The games must be: (1) Colt Pong — a Pong variant where the player controls a paddle against a CPU opponent; (2) Colt Tetris — a Tetris variant with falling neon-colored tetrominoes; (3) Colt Breakout — a Breakout/Arkanoid variant with a paddle, ball, and destructible neon blocks; (4) Colt Asteroids — a top-down shooter where the player shoots neon asteroids; (5) Colt Racer — a top-down endless lane-dodging racer. Each game must have a score counter and a restart mechanic. All five games must be selectable from the existing GamesTab game grid and open in the full-screen game view with a back button, consistent with how Flappy Colt and Neon Snake are currently displayed.
